content.rendered:
The FOSS4G-Asia 2023 organizing committee wishes to announce the third David A. Hastings Award for exceptional contributions to the Free and Open Source Solutions for Geoinformatics (FOSS4G) communities in Asia.

If you would like to nominate someone for the award, please send your nominations directly to Venkatesh Raghavan, Chair, David Hastings Award Committee, at raghavan@omu.ac.jp. The last date for the nominations is 15th September 2023 (23:59UTC).

For details, see https://foss4g.asia/2023/awards/
